title: Venomous: An action packed hunt through the desert for a legendary lost mine.
description: There are many treasures. Would you have the brains and courage to find this one?Oliver Stanton is a kid far from home. Raised in the privilidged society of Boston, he finds himself roaming through the Arizona desert in a battle to survive. Enduring temperatures he never thought possible and a terrain that threatens injury at every step, he races to find a treasure lost to history.Â Buy the book today in the format of your choice and set out on a desert adventure.
author: Brian Clifford
